summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the payment of the cost and expense of the condemnation of Olive Way, from the intersection of East Olive Street from the west with Bellevue Avenue, northeasterly to the intersection of East John Street with Belmont Avenue North; of East John Street, between Belmont Avenue North and Fifteenth Avenue North, as provided in Ordinance No. 41943 of said city, by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay therefor.
